doc.title: Without Secrets
doc.plot: Without Secrets, is an exciting thriller filled with drama and action. When the cure for AIDS is finally found by scientists, a race against time begins that uncovers a frightening tale of Government cover-ups and powerful pharmaceutical companies. The story takes us to Puerto Vallarta, where our hero, Jessica, seeks refuge with the Mexican Government. What ensues next is a battle between the CIA, FBI and the Mexican Mafia. Without Secrets is a climactic story of twists and turns that is simultaneously thought-provoking, dramatic and entertaining.
